description: Try our easy to follow Herb & Garlic Sweet Potato Stacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Herb & Garlic Sweet Potato Stacks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Scatter over half the parmesan and top with sage. Bake for a further 10 minutes or until tops have browned and sage is crisp. Remove toothpicks, scatter over remaining parmesan and serve.
